scripts.reset: rm -rf .soroban-example-dapp && rm -rf .next && rm -rf node_modules/crowdfund-contract && rm -rf node_modules/abundance-token && npm run setup
scripts.postinstall: ./target/bin/soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/soroban_crowdfund_contract.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/crowdfund_id) --output-dir ./node_modules/crowdfund-contract --network $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/network) --contract-name crowdfund-contract && ./target/bin/soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/abundance_token.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/abundance_token_id) --output-dir ./node_modules/abundance-token --network $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/network) --contract-name abundance-token
